# **Exchange Seats**

**Difficulty:** Medium  •  **Tags:** `CASE` • `MOD`



## **Problem Description**

Swap the seat id of every two consecutive students. If odd total, last student stays.



## **Table Schema**

**seats**
```
+---------+------+
| Column  | Type |
+---------+------+
| id      | INT  |
| student | TEXT |
+---------+------+
```



## **Example**

### **Input**

**seats**
```
+----+---------+
| id | student |
+----+---------+
| 1  | Abbot   |
| 2  | Doris   |
| 3  | Emerson |
| 4  | Green   |
| 5  | Jeames  |
+----+---------+
```

### **Expected Output**

```
+----+---------+
| id | student |
+----+---------+
| 1  | Doris   |
| 2  | Abbot   |
| 3  | Green   |
| 4  | Emerson |
| 5  | Jeames  |
+----+---------+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE seats(id INT, student TEXT); INSERT INTO seats VALUES (1,'Abbot'),(2,'Doris'),(3,'Emerson'),(4,'Green'),(5,'Jeames');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT CASE WHEN id % 2 = 1 AND id = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM seats) THEN id WHEN id % 2 = 1 THEN id + 1 ELSE id - 1 END AS id, student FROM seats ORDER BY id;
